Firestike knew the consequences of his actions.  But that was no 
excuse to be a coward, a brief moment before the explosion had 
occured he had opend his direct link to switchblade, a brethen of 
sorts, and had sent detailed information.  The message said 
"Switchblade, I am sending you my essence, my being, my mind, 
make me a new body, make it spectacular for our fight against 
these malatious fools.  To be back soon,  
Fireblade."

The name would be an importance in the message to Switchblade, 
showing that it was in fact his personality that was bound to the 
protection of Switchblade, and not Megatron as Firestrike was, and 
that it was this mind thath ad sent himself.

The body went limp as the mind had be sent out of him, and the 
body disentegrated in the blast.
